content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a key partner of Burberry in Digital and other IT departments EPAM provides a broad range of services and competencies. Some of the main programs and areas of expertise of the engagement include replacement of legacy platform with latest technologies, approaches and solutions for back-end and front-end development in e-commerce domain; Big Data (Analytics platform and Analytics Products) that allows for improved recommendations, personalization and reporting; Hybris platform customization and extension; iOS mobile development as well as managed services as DevOps production support and many others.
